caption:
This atmospheric image captures a serene silhouette landscape, dominated by a mirror-like body of water enclosed by mountain ridges on either side. The photograph, taken during what appears to be either dawn or dusk, portrays a tranquil and somewhat mystical scene. The sky, with a blend of light and clouds, reflects beautifully on the water, creating a symmetrical duplicate image where the dividing line is almost indistinguishable.

The mountains are dark, creating a sharp and striking contrast against the lighter sky reflected in the water. The stillness of the water further enhances the mirror effect, giving the impression of a complete circle at the center where the tips of the mountains and their reflections almost meet. The visual trickery slightly distorts perspective, suggesting a landscape both vast and intimate at the same time.

Overall, the photograph elicits a sense of calm and solitude, capturing a moment of natural beauty where the elements of sky, water, and earth converge in a quiet display of symmetry and reflection. There are no visible human activities or structures, emphasizing the untouched and pristine character of the environment.
title: Tranquil stretch of the snake river in hells canyon on the Idaho-Oregon state line.  Alternation of the river between mirror-like stillness and raging turbulence gives special fascination to the region
